external_games.name: FSX: Steam Edition - Kastellorizo Airport (LGKJ) Add-On

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Kastellorizo Airport (LGKJ)
storyline:
Every house in the village, the town hall, school, churches, hotels, bars, chapels, military installations and much more have been realistically recreated, and the shape of the whole island has been modeled manually in order to accurately recreate its outline.

Kastelorizo Airport (LGKJ) is rendered in high-detail, including a paved runway and apron, detailed models of the terminal buildings, realistic night lighting and more details like baggage carts, animated flags and passengers. Just like the real airport, there are no navaids (apart from the NDB) or ILS installed at the airport. Pilots have to call Info at 122.90 to avoid conflicts with other aircraft.

Be sure to watch out for the fences at both ends of the runway!
summary: The tiny airport, the thrilling approach, the narrow margin between a good landing and a landing which ends in the perimeter fence: they make Kastellorizo a special destination for every pilot. ‘The Aegean Pearl’ has been recreated in its entirety for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition, including the rough mountains, the unique airport and the village of Kastellorizo itself.
